archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.1.6a: a) collecting evidence of positive security behaviour from relevant sources (e.g. alerts from tools such as DLP, results of phishing campaigns and feedback from awareness initiatives)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
